src/ghl/ghl.service.ts.description: handleWorkflowAction method uses EvolutionApiClient for all action types. Interactive buttons and reply buttons are converted to text messages since Evolution API doesn't support native buttons. Source field updated from GREEN-API to EVOLUTION-API.

src/ghl/ghl.controller.ts.description: GhlController updated to use createEvolutionInstanceForUser with new DTO (instanceName, evolutionApiUrl, evolutionApiKey). Logger migrated from GreenApiLogger to NestJS Logger.

src/webhooks/webhooks.controller.ts.description: Webhook endpoint changed from /green-api to /evolution. Uses handleEvolutionWebhook method with EvolutionWebhook type. Logger migrated from GreenApiLogger to NestJS Logger. GreenApiWebhookGuard removed.
